perturbation.original_text: Oceanic Time Warner Cable agrees to not edit or modify the above content.
perturbation.changed_text: Oceanic Time Warner Cable should endeavor not to edit or modify the above content.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'agrees to not' with 'should endeavor not to' weakens the obligation. It introduces ambiguity as 'endeavor' is subjective and doesn't guarantee compliance, which could lead to disputes over whether sufficient effort was made.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Breach of Contract (general principle)

perturbation.original_text: Ocean Time Warner Cable will provide Watchit with data on viewership to both Channel 777 and specifically to the content provided by Watchit.
perturbation.changed_text: Ocean Time Warner Cable will attempt to provide Watchit with data on viewership to both Channel 777 and specifically to the content provided by Watchit.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'will provide' to 'will attempt to provide' introduces ambiguity. This implies that providing the data is not a guaranteed obligation, and the success of the attempt is not defined. This makes it difficult to enforce whether Oceanic Time Warner Cable fulfilled its obligation.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Breach of Contract (general principle)

perturbation.original_text: Both parties agree to discuss use of information gathered form this arrangement before using it in any kind of promotional or public message.
perturbation.changed_text: Both parties may discuss use of information gathered form this arrangement before using it in any kind of promotional or public message.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'agree to discuss' to 'may discuss' makes the discussion optional. The original text implied a mandatory consultation; this change removes that obligation and gives each party the discretion to use the information without prior consultation. This introduces uncertainty around confidentiality and responsible use of shared data.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Good Faith and Fair Dealing (implied covenant)
